  • Constructor Details

    • Rule

      public Rule​(String ruleName, LinkedList<Condition> conditions, LinkedList<Integer> logicOperators, boolean isClassRule)
      Creates rule with the specified ruleName, conditions, logicOperators and isClassRule.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the conditions and logic operators provided make up an invalid Rule. A valid rule with n conditions must have n-1 logic operators.

  • Method Details

    • evaluateRule

      public boolean evaluateRule​(reader.Line lineToEvaluate)
      Evaluates the whole logic value of this rule, based on the values of the specified line. This value is obtained by alternating conditions and logic operators in conditions and logicOperators
      Returns:
      true if the logic value of the rule is true.
      See Also:
      Condition.evaluateCondition(Line), compareConditions(boolean, int, boolean)

    • compareConditions

      public boolean compareConditions​(boolean firstConditionValue, int logicOperator, boolean secondConditionValue) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Compares the logic value of the specified condition values using the specified logicOperator
      Returns:
      true if the provided expression evaluates to true
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the specified logic operator isn't valid i.e. not part of the accepted operators

    • getConditions

      public LinkedList<Condition> getConditions()
      Returns the condition attribute of this rule.
      Returns:
      logicOperators attribute of this rule.

    • getLogicOperators

      public LinkedList<Integer> getLogicOperators()
      Returns the logicOperators attribute of this rule.
      Returns:
      logicOperators attribute of this rule.

    • getRuleName

      public String getRuleName()
      Returns the ruleName attribute of this rule.
      Returns:
      ruleName attribute of this rule.

    • isClassRule

      public boolean isClassRule()
      Returns the isClassRule attribute of this rule.
      Returns:
      isClassRule attribute of this rule.

    • equals

      public boolean equals​(Object obj)
      Compares the specified object with this rule. Returns true if the specified object is a rule with the same attributes as this rule. Compares ruleName, isClassRule, conditions and logicOperators
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Returns:
      true if the specified object is a rule with the same attributes as this rule.
      See Also:
      Object.equals(Object), Condition.equals(Object)
